/opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/latest/linux/bin/icpx CMakeFiles/test_reduce.dir/integration_tests/test_reduce.cc.o -o bin/test_reduce   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64 -lstdc++fs -lpthread /opt/intel/oneapi/mpi/2021.6.0/lib/libmpicxx.so /opt/intel/oneapi/mpi/2021.6.0/lib/libmpifort.so /opt/intel/oneapi/mpi/2021.6.0/lib/release/libmpi.so /usr/lib64/libdl.so /usr/lib64/librt.so /usr/lib64/libpthread.so libbbts-common.a -lstdc++fs -ldl -Wl,-rpath=/opt/intel/oneapi/mkl/2022.1.0/lib/intel64 /opt/intel/oneapi/mkl/2022.1.0/lib/intel64/libmkl_rt.so /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/latest/linux/compiler/lib/intel64/libiomp5.so -lm -ldl /usr/local/lib/libprotobuf.so -lpthread /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread
